Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png'}
{3: 'At daybreak, the street remains hushed, free of its usual bustle. A few early visitors arrive with the morning breeze, bringing a spark of life to the tranquil marketplace.'}
{3: 'Camu clutches a scribbled sketch, navigating winding alleys in search of a hidden teahouse few ever notice.'}
{3: "Camu suggested this teahouse, took care of the reservation, and even offered to guide you. But so far, your trip doesn't seem to be going so well."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'This is strange... We should have reached it by now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'But somehow... things just keep getting stranger.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Should I take the lead?', 3: '10', 4: 'Maybe we should ask someone for directions?', 5: '11'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'I can find it myself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "No one's around at this hour.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if answering Camu, a small dog darts out from the depths of the alley with a wooden sign in its mouth.'}
{2: 'Puppy', 3: 'Woof!'}
{3: 'The sign reads, "If you want to go to the teahouse, follow me."'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '...Should we go after it?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Seems like that's all we can do.", 3: '18', 4: "Let's give it a try.", 5: '18'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory262.png'}
{3: "Surprisingly, the little dog leads you with pinpoint accuracy, slipping through narrow side streets like it's done this a hundred times. Before you know it, you're at the teahouse entrance."}
{3: "Once you reach the teahouse, the dog sets down the small wooden sign it's been holding in its mouth, lets out a soft whine, and settles by the porch."}
{3: 'An elderly man with snow-white hair emerges from the back of the teahouse and takes over from the little dog. He leads you two to a table and invites you to sit.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Teahouse Owner', 3: "I'm sorry I couldn't greet you myself. I have trouble getting around these days, so I sent my dog in my place. You didn't run into any problems on the way, did you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'No problems at all. If anything... this dog is incredibly smart.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Is this... the fabled guard dog everyone talks about?', 4: '1'}
{3: "You are not sure if it's just you, but Camu looks a bit... excited right now."}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "It's incredible how accurately it handles guiding. It must've gone through all sorts of specialized training.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Hmm... I really want to know what kind of lessons it usually takes.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teahouse Owner', 3: "Haha, actually I haven't given it any formal training. I just let it help out with a few day-to-day chores.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teahouse Owner', 3: "Anyway, make yourselves comfortable. I'm going back to the counter now—come find me when you're ready to order some tea.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After the teahouse owner leaves, Camu crouches down. The little dog seems to pick up on his intention and lifts its head with a mix of obedience and pride.'}
{3: 'Camu naturally reaches out and pets its fluffy head, then moves on to stroke its ears, its neck, and finally its paws...'}
{3: 'Time passes quietly—before anyone notices, five minutes have gone by.'}
{2: '...', 3: '39', 4: 'Uh-hum.', 5: '39', 6: '(Remind Camu that you two still need to order tea)', 7: '39'}
{3: "As if suddenly recalling there's someone behind him, Camu springs up in a hurry."}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Hmph. I think that by watching this puppy's behavior, we can figure out what kind of training it normally gets. That's why I've spent so much time on it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'This is a crucial reference for how we should approach and tame surface animals moving forward.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu goes quiet for a few seconds, then suddenly takes your hand, pulling you down to squat side by side with him in front of the puppy.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '...Try it yourself.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His voice is so firm it leaves no room for refusal.'}
{2: '...How should I try?', 3: '51', 4: 'To pat the puppy?', 5: '52'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Just give it a gentle pat on the head—it won't resist.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Because this is a mission rehearsal, you're joining as well, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Following Camu's lead, you rest your hand on the puppy's warm little head. The moment your fingers brush its silky fur, you're instantly immersed in its comforting softness."}
{3: 'Gently stroke, rub, and hold... Feeling a lively little creature beneath your hands is both thrilling and reassuring.'}
{3: "The early morning sun settles softly on you two seated side by side, casting a wavering patch of light on Camu's face."}
{3: "He doesn't even notice the dawn's arrival; he's too focused on your hand, closely observing each movement and offering quiet guidance."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Yes... just like that... now, give a gentle rub behind its ears.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "This pressure feels perfect. When an animal's comfortable, it makes this kind of face.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As he speaks, a gentle smile spreads across his face—one he doesn't even realize is there."}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Commandant, you really know how to handle animals.', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's all thanks to your teaching.", 3: '65', 4: 'You seem pretty good at it yourself.', 5: '65'}
{3: 'He hears the remark and immediately looks a bit embarrassed again.'}
{3: "He can't find any excuse this time. After a brief pause, he confesses."}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Ahem. I used to want a puppy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'I mean... when I was still human.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Back then, I imagined a little puppy lying at the door, just waiting for me to come back...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Maybe that would make a place truly feel like "home."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'But I had spent my life roaming the surface, fighting wherever war leads me, always skating along the edge of life and death—so it never felt like a real possibility.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You can make it a reality now.', 3: '76'}
{3: "He stops what he's doing, his hands frozen in place."}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'So... are you saying...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '...we can actually raise a puppy together?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yes, you've got a stable place to live in now, right?", 3: '81'}
{2: "It's still kind of tough to bring a real puppy onto Babylonia at the moment...", 3: '82'}
{2: "But if it's a companion-type mechanical pet, we might be able to get permission.", 3: '83'}
{3: 'Camu closes his eyes, as if picturing something—or maybe weighing his options.'}
{3: 'Maybe sensing the shift in your conversation, the dog on the porch lowers its ears and huddles in a corner, making no further sound.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "...No, Commandant. I've made up my mind—I don't need any companion-type mechanical pets.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Camu opens his violet eyes again. There's no trace of doubt in his tone."}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "If we're going to get a dog, let's wait until all of this is over. We'll have a real one as our pet when we can finally live on the surface.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'After thinking it through, I realize that only a true "guard dog" belongs in our home.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Commandant, they say... today's the perfect day to make a promise.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu gently grasps your wrist with a strength no human can break free from. Soft yet unyielding, he etches an invisible mark into your palm.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I promise you, when the time comes, we'll pick out a dog just for us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'And then... when that moment arrives, ahem...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His voice trails off again, but his resolve still rings loud and clear in every word.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'When that day comes, you will become my family, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "You're not allowed to refuse—after all, you just promised me.", 4: '1'}
